      • getPATH

        public static java.lang.String getPATH()

      • getListOfFullORFfromPeptide

        public static void getListOfFullORFfromPeptide​(java.lang.String fileName,
                                               Genome genome)
        From a list of peptide position retrieve the complete sequence of the ORF (in frame) containing the peptide (amino acid sequence)
        WARNING: Be careful that your peptide info (begin,end) are correct. Test (begin-end+1)/3 = an integer, meaning that it is actually the sequence of a amino acid sequence.
        If one or two nucleotides are included where they should not be, the algorithm will not work.
        Parameters:
        fileName -
